plot: Serenity encounters a ruthlessly professional bounty hunter, Jubal Early, who will stop at nothing to retrieve River. But River, feeling unwelcome on the ship, takes a novel approach to escaping from the Alliance.

As River's insightful mind wanders, she inadvertently stumbles across one of Jayne's weapons, believing it to be a tree branch; suddenly she awakes and sees Mal and the crew scared. River overhears Mal and the crew talking about her and she feels rejected. Meanwhile, the ruthless bounty hunter Jubal Early, who has tracked down River, boards the Serenity while everybody is sleeping. He subdues Mal and locks the crew in the cabins; ties Kaylee up in the engine room; hits Shepherd Book on the head; and he finally captures Simon to force him to deliver his sister. However River is missing. Out of the blue, she says through the communication system that she felt rejected and had melted away, becoming part of Serenity. The skeptical Early does not believe her at first, but soon he is convinced she is telling the truth. What will happen to River?—Claudio Carvalho, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil

The Alliance has placed a bounty on River Tam's head and a bounty hunter named Jubal Early sets out to claim the bounty and tracks down the Serenity crew. Jubal sneaks on-board the Serenity while the crew is asleep to capture River and Simon and return them to the Alliance, so he can be paid for their capture and only River can stop him.—Daniel Williamson
